info.title: Slack OAuth API
info.description: The API for management Slack OAuths

get.summary: Exchanges a temporary OAuth code for an API token.
get.description: Exchanges a temporary OAuth code for an API token.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: Issued when you created your application.

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: Issued when you created your application.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The code param returned via the OAuth callback.

parameters.name: redirect_uri
parameters.description: This must match the originally submitted URI (if one was sent).
